About Me

Enthusiastic and ambitious, I am interested in IT and everything similar. Always envious of creatives and their ability to bring their ideas to life, but at the same time being a very logical individual, I was drawn to web development. The opportunity to bring to life the designs of others, and myself through complex algorithms and bits of code is a dream come true to me. That excitement has led me to dedicate myself to learning every facet of this field . Therefore I am looking for the opportunity to put that practice to work as a Front End Developer.

How can I help you?

My goal as a Front-end Developer is to help small businesses create an online presence that greatly increases their exposure to target markets.

I look forward to helping you create a responsive, mobile-friendly site that engages and retains your target market.
